notes: Implemented AudioAnalyzer with Web Audio API AnalyserNode. Key design decisions: (1) Implements AudioBufferReceiver interface to integrate with AudioAdapter.connect() pattern, (2) Uses requestAnimationFrame for ~60fps data emission, (3) Supports configurable FFT sizes (256, 512, 1024, 2048), (4) Implements amplitude smoothing with configurable attack/release times using exponential smoothing, (5) Provides lazy AudioContext initialization, (6) Returns copies from getters to prevent external mutation, (7) Properly cleans up resources on destroy(). All 54 tests pass including coverage for edge cases.
